data.title: The Awesome Foundation
data.meta_description: Forwarding the interest of Awesome in the universe, $1,000 at a time.
data.text:
About Us

NEED SOME FUNDING!?

The Durham Awesome Foundation is dedicated to supporting fun, innovative and impactful projects that'll impact Durham in a positive way. Our goal is to fund initiatives that can significantly benefit from a $1000 grant. We seek proposals that demonstrate a clear vision and a thoughtful plan for the utilization of the grant funds. Here's what makes a project a perfect candidate for our grant:

IDEAL PROJECT CHARACTERISTICS:

Local Focus: Your project should be based in the Triangle area, with a special emphasis on creating positive change in Durham.

Significant Impact: We look for projects where a grant of $1000 can make a substantial difference in achieving success.

Clear Plan: Applicants must present a well-defined strategy for how the grant will be utilized to advance their project.

PROJECTS NOT SUITABLE FOR THIS GRANT:

For-Profit Ventures: We do not provide funding to start or support for-profit businesses.

Overly Ambitious or Infeasible Projects: Proposals that seem too ambitious or unrealistic in scope are less likely to be selected.

Note: Your idea is yours alone. We don't want a stake in it. We just want to help you make it happen!

Find out more about the Awesome Foundation at awesomefoundation.org üëè.
